name: GeeseSounds
0:
”Alexa open Geese Sounds”
”Alexa ask Geese Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: geese sounds
des:
Bring the ambiance of a lakeside scene into your space with the honking of geese. This skill captures the essence of being near a body of water where geese are gathering, providing a natural and wild soundscape.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Geese Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
